item.title: The Telegram Problem
item.description: The problem Write a program that takes a number w, then accepts lines of text and outputs lines of text, where the output lines have as many words as possible but are never longer than w characters. Words may not be split, but you may assume that no single word is too long for a line. Source Solution This is a straightforward problem when it comes down to it, but it takes some thinking to get there.
